description:
History: He is a gang leader from Nagoyama
He`s loud and powerful - he is GATE SUPER! Or so he claims... He`s a man who fights with a reason, that`s why he joined the Gate Keepers. Well, that`s only one of his reasons, he also wants to show his muscularity to everyone! Although at first, he`s a Gate Keeper in training, in the end he shows real power!
He assists Megane in mechanical stuff and is good friends with him.
name: Banba Choutarou
